BonusSpellKeywordChoiceFeature.Name: Major Property
BonusSpellKeywordChoiceFeature.Text: While attuned to the artifact, you can use an action to cast one 5th-level spell (chosen by the DM) from it. After you cast the spell, roll a d6. On a roll of 1-5, you can't cast it again until the next dawn.
